text: First visit to this clinic for treatment of cough and flu left me disappointed. Instead of focusing on my immediate ailment, I was given unsolicited advice about weight gain, which felt unrelated to my visit. While I understand that overall health is important and a doctor’s guidance is valuable, I expected the consultation to address my primary concern. Additionally, when I mentioned walking as my form of exercise, the dismissive remark that it ‘is not exercise’ further dampened my experience. Unfortunately, this interaction affected my mood for the rest of the day.
Fast and smooth. Almost no waiting time. The front counter staff were very friendly and helpful. The Doctor was kind and very thorough in his checks.Staff Juliet, Farhana Denfi Dr Jason Tan.
Not really a friendly service. It doesn't let you schedule an appointment when you're unwell and prefer not to stay in the clinic for an extended period.
Dr Philip Koh is very good and his staff are friendly, but please engage relief drs as good as him.
Queue Number is 22 next queue number is 23. Uncle with queue number 3 just came don't know from where after long hours. Uncle should get a new queue number. Bad protocol at this clinic.
